variables.title: model_id
variables.description: The ID of the model to be used for this request. Please refer to the list of models at https://bam.res.ibm.com/docs/models

variables.title: model_parameters_max_new_tokens
variables.description: The maximum number of new tokens to be generated.

variables.title: model_parameters_temperature
variables.description: The value used to module the next token probabilities. The range is 0.05 to 1.00, a value set to 0.05 would make it mostly deterministic.

variables.title: model_response
variables.description: The text generated by the model in response to the inputs.
